original_title: ヒロイン洗脳Vol.27 ～秘密少女捜査官セーラーエージェントYUKI～ 泉りおん
overview: The head of an organization that plans terrorism ... I'm Sara. Yuki Himemiya, a secret investigator, contacts Kizaki, who oversees the science department, in order to infiltrate the organization and obtain evidence of wrongdoing. Yuki helps Kizaki who is attacked by someone. Kizaki, who witnessed the strength of her Yuki, invited her Yuki to her organization. Kizaki takes Yuki to the source of Gasara. And infiltrate the organization safely! … It looks like he did, but he is told that he must perform a ritual and drink some holy water to enter the organization. Can the secret investigator sailor agent YUKI infiltrate the organization and prevent the evil of Gasara ...? !! [BAD END]
title: Heroine Brainwashing Vol.27 – Secret Girl Investigator Sailor Agent YUKI – Rion Izumi
